sentence.Network_en: The agreement has raised hopes that the war may end soon.
sentence.Network_cn: 那项协议使人们感到战争有望很快结束。

sentence.Network_en: Rationing had put an end to a surfeit of biscuits long ago.
sentence.Network_cn: 定量供应很久以前就结束了饼干过剩的状况。

sentence.Network_en: He had wandered to the far end of the room.

list.abs: 2、按照押韵所在的位置来分，有尾韵（end rhyme），头韵（alliteration）和行中韵（internal rhyme）：1）尾韵（end rhyme）顾名 …

means.word_mean: 1. rhymed on the terminal syllables of the verses
